sentence: I was refused early check in unles I upgraded my room to a more expensive room
The room service is on the pricey side
Room felt older
We were with our children so they enjoyed the pool and hot tub although it did have a funky smell to it
There was dust in my room on the lamp and in the bathroom

in the time it took me to smoke a cigarette i was spat on threatened and offered everything imaginable after this a drink was in order and guess what the bar was shut at 130pm on departure from the hotel i complained about the lies given to us about our room to the manager to be told what do you want me to do about it i said well the 57 dollar parking fee would be a start this was met with laughter and yet another no
We were also told that we had had water from the mini bar as a bottle was found on the flor not true
Although the room was beautiful there were a few issues that would cause me not to stay in the future
My flight was delayed and I had a horrible headache I called them on my way to see if I could get some aspirin and they had it waiting for me in my room
the room was similar to the previous stay but the bathroom was gorgeous and there was a vanity area too
Thanks so much for holding our bags and letting us use your facilities to shower and refresh as we were not flying out till late
Good location close union squareThe hall of the hotel is marbleSmal rooms
Location staff and spacious room
The staff is great and helpful we had a very nice view on San Francisco
Rooms and services are good
Staff was friendly hotel is very nice rooms are great early check in was awesome close to union square
Beautiful hotel and rooms were really nice location is perfect
Overall the hotel was decent and our room was very clean and nice
Beds are comfortable nice water pressure in shower with multiple options neat housekeeping stunning views from the 21st floor
Perfect location but small room
